serviceTitle: This is a tool for sharing estimates of Twitter user's age
serviceDescription: In order to protect under who are under the age of 18 from R18 content, we have using 'Limited access only Twitter list members/Twitter followers' features of some services like Poipiku or Privatter. But it's always very tough work guessing follower's age from bio, tweets or something, so I created this tool to help individual creators will be able to create and publish their works more safety & easier.
serviceDescription2: If age verification is very hard work by myself, we will share the result!
